  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby​(java.lang.String name1, java.lang.String name2)
      2 PLAYERS GAME

      Lobby is where players go after the choose of name in Server;

      It's created by the Server to allocate players passed as parameters in a game

      Here we have all the logic to support Choose of Colors and Cards by players; After that we are ready to start a Real Game, and so the Lobby Phase is over

      Parameters:
      name1 - Name of first player
      name2 - Name of second player
      See Also:
      Server

    • Lobby

      public Lobby​(java.lang.String name1, java.lang.String name2, java.lang.String name3)
      Same as for 2 players, but this create a game for 3 players
      Parameters:
      name1 - Name of first player
      name2 - Name of second player
      name3 - Name of third player
      See Also:
      Lobby(String, String)

  • Method Details

    • chooseColor

      public boolean chooseColor​(java.lang.String info)
      Gets from the controller the color chosen by the player. It checks if the color is still available, and then save the player choice.

      After that it checks if all player have choose their color; If this is true, it goes to the choose of Card phase.

      At the end the method notify to the views the changes.

      The method take one choice at time, so it need to be called multiple times to perform all the choices

      Parameters:
      info - The color chosen by the player
      Returns:
      true if the color is available, false otherwise

    • chooseCard

      public boolean chooseCard​(java.lang.String chosenCard)
      Gets from the MasterPlayer the cards with which the players will play.

      After that it gets the card selected by the Otherplayers and save their choices.

      At the end the method notify to the views the changes.

      The method take one choice at time, so it need to be called multiple times to perform all the choices

      Parameters:
      chosenCard - The card chosen by the player
      Returns:
      true if the card is available, false otherwise

    • chooseStartPlayer

      public boolean chooseStartPlayer​(java.lang.String playersName)
      Set the player who need to start the game, chosen by the MASTER PLAYER
      Parameters:
      playersName - Player choose by the master
      Returns:
      true if the player exist, false otherwise

    • updateChosenDeck

      protected void updateChosenDeck​(Card chosenCard, Lobby.Insert insert)
      Add or remove a card from the chosen Deck, after a player's choice
      Parameters:
      chosenCard - Card chosen by the player
      insert - To disguise ADD from REMOVE

      public StateOfTurn getStateOfTurn()

      Returns:
